name: com.demonshop.demonpanel
description: Creator-side optimization toolbox for VRChat worlds. Editor utilities (probes, occlusion, shaders, lights/LOD, colliders/scripts). Includes a Udon sample for runtime toggling (import via Package Manager â†’ Samples).
